entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Trenton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:07 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow and Blowing Snow, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
